definition: to take something into the palm of one's hand, usually for concealing or as part of a sleight-of-hand magic trick, the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
details:
verb
- to take something into the palm of one's hand, usually for concealing or as part of a sleight-of-hand magic trick
= example: to take something into the palm of one's hand, usually for concealing or as part of a sleight-of-hand magic trick
- to touch, lift, or hold with the hands
= example: to touch, lift, or hold with the hands
= synonyms: handle
noun
- the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
= example: the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers
= synonyms: thenar
- an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
= example: an award for winning a championship or commemorating some other event
= synonyms: decoration
- any plant of the family Palmae having an unbranched trunk crowned by large pinnate or palmate leaves
= example: any plant of the family Palmae having an unbranched trunk crowned by large pinnate or palmate leaves
= synonyms: palm tree
- a linear unit based on the length or width of the human hand
= example: a linear unit based on the length or width of the human hand
